name: Damn Them All - A Fenébe Mindegyiket
name_original: Damn Them All - A Fenébe Mindegyiket
description:
Damn Them All ( A Fenébe Mindegyiket ) 
is an experimental demo game designed for a university game jam.

The provided constraints were:
- You are the enemy
- Mythology
- Gore
- One button input.

Plot:
Damn Them All is loosely based on a Hungarian folklore/mythology of a Fene, a demon/spirit.
Playing as the Fene, abruptly woken from a long slumber, you find the land has been terraformed by a small village.
Angered, you project your wrath upon the helpless inhabitants, kill the villagers, burn their houses, destroy their hard work - Damn them all!

How to play:
The Fene will move towards the mouse cursor, the further away from the Fene it is, the faster it will move, hover over the top of the Fene to stop moving.
Right Mouse button - CLICK to shoot fire,  HOLD whilst hovering over an item or dead villager to pick it up and RELEASE it while flicking the mouse to throw it.


If you enjoy this small experimental game demo please support my work by following me on Instagram to view all my other work.
https://www.instagram.com/matyas_korhecz/
I am currently in the development of a fantasy RPG "Zelda-like" game based on Indo-European/ Hungarian mythology.
This will be a full-fledged released game on Steam in due time.
